problem.markdown:
Answer the following questions by using the charts you created. (Hint: Use the slicers)
>>In year 2013, which Category has the most sales from Abbas Manufacturer goods?<< ( ) Mix ( ) Rural (x) Urban ( ) Youth
>>What is the percentage of that category?<< ( ) 53.38% ( ) 55.38% (x) 57.38% ( ) 59.38%
problem.p: Answer the following questions by using the charts you created. (Hint: Use the slicers)
